headline: How PepsiCo’s 8% Rally and New Packaging Push Could Impact Its 2025 Valuation
summary: Trying to decide what to do with PepsiCo stock? You are not alone. PepsiCo is on a lot of investors’ radars right now, especially with its recent price moves. In just the last month, PepsiCo climbed 8.1%, making quite a recovery after lagging the overall market earlier this year. Even over the past week the stock is up 1.1%, suggesting some renewed confidence or possibly shifting sentiment around risk. Of course, it is not all a straight line. Before this recent momentum, PepsiCo had a tough...

headline: Morningstar Retirement and NPPG Announce Strategic Integration to Expand Access to Personalized Retirement Services
summary: CHICAGO, October 22, 2025--Morningstar Retirement, part of Morningstar, Inc. (Nasdaq: MORN) a leading provider of independent investment insights, today announced a strategic collaboration with NPPG Plan Professionals, LLC, a related company of National Professional Planning Group, Inc. (NPPG), a leading Pooled Plan Provider (PPP) and intermediary fiduciary, to deliver personalized retirement offerings to employers through Pooled Employer Plans (PEPs).

headline: Coke & Pepsi Earnings to Lift Consumer Staples ETFs?
summary: Coke (KO) & Pepsi (PEP) posted strong earnings, sparking likely gains in consumer staples ETFs like XLP, FSTA & VDC.

headline: A Fresh Look at PepsiCo (PEP) Valuation Following a Recent 8% Rise in Share Price
summary: PepsiCo (PEP) shares have seen some movement lately, prompting investors to take a closer look at the company’s recent performance and valuation. Over the past month, the stock has climbed about 8%. See our latest analysis for PepsiCo. PepsiCo's 8% share price return over the last month hints at renewed investor interest, especially after a soft patch earlier this year. While momentum has improved in the short term, the one-year total shareholder return remains negative. This highlights the...
